notes.text: We no longer show the Open in New Tab option in the context menu if the object page is set to open in edit mode
We now sort the values in columns by their unit of measure or currency first, followed by the values
We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
We've resolved an issue with value help condition propagation when there are no conditions
We now add stable identification values to each of the segmented button items in the content switcher elements on the analytical list page
The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
We've resolved an error that prevented the change handlers from executing for fields that are bound to a JSON model
We've removed the paginator reference from subobject pages, as it is no longer needed
We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the tree table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
We now display 10 fixed rows in a tree or analytical table on an object page by default when the table is not the sole control in the section or when the sectionLayout is set to Page
We now set the rowCountMode parameter in the grid table to Auto when entering fullscreen mode
We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
We now use the correct icons for criticality, as defined in the SAP Fiori for Web Design Guidelines
We now ensure that the isValid parameter of the change event is correctly set based on the MDC promise in the FieldAPI
We now set 'Multi' as the default selection mode for a tree table if the selection mode is not specified in the manifest
We now ensure that the table selection mode works correctly
We now allow an action-specific title in the action parameter dialog
We've resolved an issue with navigation from the error message for empty but required fields
We now support semantic coloring for criticality at row level in table integration cards
We no longer allow using the drag-and-drop functionality to move a node to a position directly adjacent to its current position
We no longer show semantically connected fields if all their contents are hidden
We now provide a VariantManagement building block, and you can now use the Apply Automatically function with the FilterBar building block
We've resolved an issue with the IDs of actions for intent-based navigation in tables
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
We now ensure that the filter context URL is included in the selection variant for quick view links, allowing potentially sensitive data to be excluded
